# UIAccessibilityScrollDirection.next

**Case**

The user is scrolling to the next view in an ordered set of views.

## Declaration

```swift
case next
```

## Constants

- **UIAccessibilityScrollDirection.right**: The user is scrolling to the right.
- **UIAccessibilityScrollDirection.left**: The user is scrolling to the left.
- **UIAccessibilityScrollDirection.up**: The user is scrolling up.
- **UIAccessibilityScrollDirection.down**: The user is scrolling down.
- **UIAccessibilityScrollDirection.previous**: The user is scrolling to the previous view in an ordered set of views.
